summary.span: 为 和 类的 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the event of the and classes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Result As RecognitionResult

summary.span: 获取所模拟识别的结果。

span.span: Gets the results of emulated recognition.

value.span: 有关识别结果的详细信息，如果发生错误，则为 。

span.span: Detailed information about the results of recognition, or if an error occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象派生和包含短语识别操作返回有关的完整信息。The object derives from and contains full information about a phrase returned by a recognition operation. 可以获取来自所有识别候选项关闭列表属性。You can obtain a list off all the recognition candidates from the property. 如果识别器遇到识别操作期间的异常属性设置为异常并属性设置为`null`。If recognizer encounters an exception during the recognition operation, the property is set to the exception and the property is set to `null`.
